EmailTemplate.name: ES-2018-07-11-Alyce-Follow-Up-July.Alyce-Follow-Up-07-11
EmailTemplate.subject: Did you receive your {{lead.Alyce Gift:default=gift}} ?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
I sent you aÂ {{lead.Alyce Gift:default=gift}} in hopes of speaking with you. Just in case you didn't receive the gift box I sent your way, you can actually select or exchange your gift for something else right here <[[{{lead.Alyce Gift Link:default=}}]]>.
I was hoping to grab 20 minutes on your calendar. We help customers simultaneously optimize IT performance, cost and compliance in real-time and we'd love to get your feedback!
Thank you so much.
Sincerely,
Catherine
Catherine.Kellogg@turbonomic.com
